decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to control the game by using a wide variety of counterspells, removal spells, and disruptive cards to disrupt the opponent's game plan while setting up its own win condition. Glarb, Calamity's Augur is the commander of the deck and provides card advantage and control options. The deck includes a mix of permission spells like Counterspell and Force Spike, removal spells like Dismember and Toxic Deluge, and card draw spells like Brainstorm and Preordain. By efficiently disrupting the opponent's strategy and drawing into key cards, the deck aims to outvalue and outmaneuver opponents to secure the win.

The deck revolves around using Slimefoot and Squee to create a constant stream of tokens and pressure the opponent with small creatures. It includes efficient removal spells like Abrupt Decay and Dismember to deal with threats, as well as versatile creatures like Elves of Deep Shadow and Birds of Paradise to ramp up mana quickly. The deck also contains powerful cards like Demonic Tutor and Survival of the Fittest to search for key pieces and maintain card advantage. Overall, the strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with a swarm of creatures backed up by disruption and card selection, ultimately leading to victory through attrition and efficient resource management.

The deck focuses on utilizing the partner commanders, Ravos and Thrasios, to create a synergistic aggro strategy with a wide range of powerful creatures and efficient spells. The deck aims to control the board early on with cards such as Fatal Push and Swords to Plowshares, while ramping up mana quickly with mana dorks like Birds of Paradise and Noble Hierarch. The deck also includes powerful tutor effects like Demonic Tutor and Worldly Tutor to find key pieces like Birthing Pod and Survival of the Fittest. With a strong mix of removal, ramp, and powerful creatures, the deck looks to overwhelm opponents quickly and efficiently.

This aggressive deck revolves around utilizing the speed and versatility of Spider-Man 2099 as the commander, supported by a mix of synergistic cards to control the battlefield and deal direct damage to opponents. The deck includes a variety of spells for removal, card draw, and disrupting the opponent's strategy. It also features creatures like Dragon's Rage Channeler and True-Name Nemesis for consistent threats on the board. The mana base is optimized for a balanced mix of colors to ensure casting the spells efficiently. Overall, the deck aims to apply pressure early in the game and maintain a strong presence to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of tempo and aggression.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and pump spells. The deck utilizes efficient creatures like Birds of Paradise, Llanowar Elves, and Questing Beast to establish an early board presence and apply pressure. It also includes powerful removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Path to Exile to deal with opposing threats. The inclusion of cards like Thalia, Heretic Cathar and Sanctifier en-Vec disrupt the opponent's game plan and slow them down. With a mix of mana acceleration, disruptive elements, and powerful beaters, the deck aims to quickly close out games before the opponent can stabilize or mount a defense.

This deck revolves around utilizing Cloud, Midgar Mercenary as the commander to create a fast-paced aggro strategy. The deck includes a mix of low-cost creatures, disruptive spells, and equipment to apply constant pressure on the opponent. Cards like Spectacular Spider-Man, Mother of Runes, and Skyclave Apparition provide early-game threats and protection. Meanwhile, spells like Armageddon, Ravages of War, and Static Prison disrupt the opponent's game plan. Equipment like Sword of Feast and Famine, Sword of War and Peace, and Umezawa's Jitte provide additional power and protection for Cloud and other creatures. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent quickly and efficiently to secure victory in a 1 vs 1 Duel Commander format.

The deck focuses on aggressive gameplay led by Peter Parker as the commander. It includes a variety of creatures, mana accelerants, and support cards to quickly build up a board presence and overwhelm the opponent. The deck features cards like Birthing Pod, Eldritch Evolution, Green Sun's Zenith, and Finale of Devastation to tutor for key creatures and maintain pressure on the opponent. With access to powerful cards like Swords to Plowshares, Teferi, Time Raveler, and Stoneforge Mystic, the deck can also control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. Overall, the deck aims to beat down the opponent with efficient creatures and versatile removal spells while maintaining a strong presence on the battlefield.

The main strategy of this deck is to utilize the token generation ability of Slimefoot in combination with the recursion provided by Squee to create a constant flow of creatures and incremental damage to overwhelm the opponent. This aggro deck aims to apply pressure early on with efficient creatures and disruption spells like Abrupt Decay and Thoughtseize, while also having access to powerful cards like Demonic Tutor and Survival of the Fittest for added consistency and versatility. The deck also includes a mix of ramp creatures, removal spells, and utility lands to support the aggressive game plan and ensure a steady stream of threats to close out the game quickly.
